metadata.title: Database for Predicting Oxidation Resistance of Refractory High-Entropy Alloys
metadata.description: This dataset contains experimental data on the oxidation resistance of conventional refractory alloys, Refractory High-Entropy Alloys (RHEAs) and Refractory Complex Concentrated Alloys (RCCAs). It is used to train and validate AI models for predicting specific mass gain during oxidation.
metadata.source: Extracted from published literature as detailed in the associated publication.

columns.name: specific_mass_gain
columns.description: Specific mass gain due to oxidation in mg/cm².

metadata.citation: S. Gorsse et al., 'Advancing Refractory High Entropy Alloy Development with AI-Predictive Models for High Temperature Oxidation Resistance,' Scripta Materialia, vol. 255, 2025.
